title: The comment section of a post on r/OffensiveHumor regarding Elliot Page's coming out as a trans man quickly devolved in a series of hate-filled rants, with many accusing him of doing it only for the attention and wishing for an end of his career.

author: InkSymptoms
text:
It’s a little off putting how these people just choose to be the way they are. Him coming out as trans doesn’t affect them personally, so I don’t get the hate.

Is this one of those closeted moments? Where someone is closet trans so they just speak hate against them?

author: WhiteWolf3117
text: Maybe im crazy but I sincerely feel like gender roles are crumbling a bit and some people are lashing out because of it. Boring people who feel that sticking to gender roles makes them interesting.

author: Brjgjdj5788
text:
Can I insult them in Italian?

Edit: I guess i won't. BTW i really speak italian

author: Brjgjdj5788
text: Understable. I apologise for the immaturity

author: Bardfinn
text: Ho parlato Italiano per la ragazza, ma sono passati 4 decenni.

author: Brjgjdj5788
text: Considering you commited only one mistake, your skills are still impressives even after all this time. Compliments
